byline.original: Correspondence of the New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: MESSRS., EDITORS: Observing from your columns, that you intend keeping your readers advised of what is passing in all sections, I send you a brief note of current events in our city and State. You will recollect that we have had a Convention in session some eight months, to revise the present miserable Constitution.

headline.main: Affairs in Virginia--Revision of the Constitution--The Coming Election, &c.
